info.name: Restaurant data
info.description: Restaurant data details in the near by locations based on the coordinates

request.description: Once we give the coordiantes of saidabad and a location radius of 6 km, corresponding restaurant samples stored in Mongodb atlas, which are indexed by Elastic Search are displayed
Once we give the coordiantes of saidabad and a location radius of 8 km, corresponding restaurant samples stored in Mongodb atlas, which are indexed by Elastic Search are displayed
Once we give the coordiantes of saidabad and a location radius of 12 km, corresponding restaurant samples stored in Mongodb atlas, which are indexed by Elastic Search are displayed
Once we give the coordiantes of saidabad and a location radius of 15 km, corresponding restaurant samples stored in Mongodb atlas, which are indexed by Elastic Search are displayed
Once we want to include new restaurant details, we need to makesure that we have the details inside the body. Other wise, we get an error message
